title: Missing cutorch.getMemoryUsage?
body_html:
There is cutorch.getMemoryUsage() in Torch7 https://github.com/torch/cutorch
But there is no similar function in PyTorch to get Cuda memory utilization information. However, the low-level cuda C API is still there. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c#L883
Is there any reason it is not brought up to python API level?

Searched PyTorch forum and found similar question -- https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/access-gpu-memory-usage-in-pytorch/3192
